snippet: New York state can end its three-decade HIV crisis by the year 2020, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Sunday as he announced an ambitious plan to deliver a knockout blow to the epidemic by boosting testing, reducing new infections and expanding treatment....

headline.print_headline: Cuomo: Boost HIV Tests, Treatment to End Epidemic
headline.main: Cuomo: Boost HIV Tests, Treatment to End Epidemic

lead_paragraph: New York state can end its three-decade HIV crisis by the year 2020, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Sunday as he announced an ambitious plan to deliver a knockout blow to the epidemic by boosting testing, reducing new infections and expanding treatment.
